attributes.action: put all money into the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think is about time the lottery money should go into the NHS the goverment are always saying we are short of this and that ie nurse, midwives, beds etc. waiting list drugs to expensive. if all the money was put in we would have enough to do all this it would be the best health service in the world where no one would have to suffer. Why should it go to arts etc where you have to pay to go and see let them be self funding. i my self have had many cancelled ops at one stage 3 times on the trot as i was on the trolley to go to theatre. With lottery money plouged in to NHS no one should have to wait any more
